name: Red & Blue (Apho)
description:
Once upon a time, people lived in peace and harmony. But all that changed, when monsters started appearing. Sensing the ominous magic, our two fledgling adventurers decide to investigate...

Follow Akane and Aoi, as they go on their first adventure ever and try to make a name for themselves.

Features:

  • There is no overworld nor maps. No getting lost, just jump straight into battles!
  • Not one, but two adventurers!
  • Funny dialogue!
  • A better love story than twilight, probably.

This is a short game lasting about 20 minutes made for the One Map Game Challenge.

Controls
  • Z - Confirm / Advance text
  • X - Cancel
  • Ctrl - Skip text
Credits
